SentInvitationsCard.subtitle: List of the invitations you have sent.
SentInvitationsCard.title: Sent Invitations

SettingsPage.user-roles-description: Each user role gives different permissions within the portal. If you think you should have additional roles, please contact us.

accepted-by-journal-dialog.text: You can now mark this manuscript as having been accepted for publication by a journal. This step will create a new publication to your profile allowing you to update the publication details. Once you know the publication details, please remember to update publication record and mark it as published so that we can help share it within the DFO community.
accepted-by-journal-dialog.title: Journal accepted for publication

add-pub-author-dialog.dialog-help: Search for the author you want to add using their name or professional email. If you cannot find the author you are looking for, or their affiliation or email has changed, you can create a new author record.
add-pub-author-dialog.title: Add an author to this publication

auth.last-login: Your last successful login was at {date}

authentication-history-card.subtitle: Suspicious activity? Change your password and immediately report it to us.
authentication-history-card.title: Authentication History

author-comments.description: Comments are required in order to respond and to allow the review to continue.
author-comments.title: Comments

author-expertise.info-text: Identifying an author's areas of expertise helps users understand and trust the content and find the information they need more easily. It also fosters collaboration among researchers, making it a valuable resource for our scientific community.
author-expertise.no-expertise: No expertise associated at this time.

author-select.cant-find-text: Can't find the author you're looking for?
author-select.empty-search-hint: Start typing to search for an author
author-select.hint: Start typing to search for an author (first name, last name, or email)
author-select.not-the-author-youre-looking-for: Not the author you're looking for?

change-password-card.new-password-required: Your account security is important to us. You're using a temporary or expired password, please change it now.
change-password-card.subtitle: Ensure your account is using a long (12 characters or more), random password to stay secure.
change-password-card.title: Change Your Password

common.author: Author | Authors
common.corresponding-author-desc: The corresponding author communicates with the journal(s) and is responsible for managing editorial issues and the manuscript's final format and content. This person is not necessarily the "first" author, which could have different meanings in different fields. For example, it could be a first or the last author or the person overseeing the publication process and, often, responsible for conceiving, supporting, and managing the project.
common.corresponding-author-toggle: Toggles whether this is a corresponding author
common.go-to-potential-public-interest-section: Go to Potential Public Interest Section
common.inactive-msg: You have been inactive for {0} minutes. You will be logged out in 2 minutes.
common.manuscript-previous-version: This is a previous version of the manuscript
common.no-results-found-hint: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find what you're looking for.
common.primary-publication: A manuscript published by a third party
common.secondary-publication: A manuscript to be published by DFO
common.title: Title

validation.at-least-one-author: At least one corresponding author is required.
validation.no-authors: No authors, please add at least one author prior to submission.
validation.password-length: Password must be at least 12 characters
validation.passwords-different: Your current and new password should be different

common.cant-download: You are not authorized to download this file.
common.publication-previous-version: This is a previous version of the publication
common.upload-a-new-version-of-the-publication: Drop the file or click to automatically upload a new version of the publication
common.upload-the-publication: Drop the file or click to automatically upload the publication
common.form-invalid: There are errors in the form, please fix them to be able to save this form.
common.no_announcements: There are no general announcements at this time.
common.announcements: Click here to show the muted announcement | Click here to show the {count} muted announcements
common.preprint-publication: A manuscript to be published on a preprint server
common.preprint-url-hint: The DOI or a URL linking directly to the preprint

create-manuscript-record-dialog.create-text: Once created, you will be taken to the manuscript record form. The manuscript record form will be marked as a draft and only be visible to you and the people you invite as observers. Once the form is complete you will be able to submit it for review.
create-manuscript-record-dialog.enter-the-title-of-your-manuscript: Enter the title of your manuscript
create-manuscript-record-dialog.primary-pub-desc: Scientific or technical document to be published in a third party journal, special issue, book chapter, book or conference proceeding
create-manuscript-record-dialog.secondary-pub-desc: Scientific or technical document to be published in a DFO Science Series
create-manuscript-record-dialog.select-region-text: Please select the lead DFO region responsible for the management review of this manuscript.

step1.text: Please select the type of manuscript you want to create based on the intended publisher.

create-manuscript-record-dialog.title: Create a New Manuscript Record Form
create-manuscript-record-dialog.what-is-the-working-title-of-your-manusc: What is the working title of your manuscript?
create-manuscript-record-dialog.prerint-pub-desc: Scientific or technical document intended for dissemination via a preprint server prior to, or independent of, formal peer-reviewed publication in a journal, book, or conference proceeding.

create-organization-dialog.p1: Once created, this organization will be available to all users. Please make sure to use the official name and abbreviation for the organization. (E.g.: do not include departments, branches or regions.)
create-organization-dialog.p2: If the name of the organization does not have an official French or English equivalent, please copy the official name in both fields.
create-organization-dialog.title: Create new Organization

step1.p1: This wizard lets you add published manuscripts to the portal; allowing you to share past publications or to add publications where the manuscript record form (MRF) was done through other means.
step1.warning: If you are here to get your manuscript reviewed by management prior to submission to a journal, do not continue, create a new manuscript record instead.

create-publication-dialog.title: Create a Publication
create-publication-dialog.published-on-hint: If left blank, publication will be created as "accepted"

dashboard.create-your-first-manuscript-record: Create your first manuscript record form

decision.refer-desc: You have reviewed the manuscript and are referring it to the next manager (usually an RDS or DG) for review.
decision.revision-desc: Flag management review comments that should be addressed by the author before completing the review.
decision.reassign-desc: You are not the correct manager to review this manuscript and reassign this review to the proper manager without making a recommendation.
decision.complete-desc: Review of this manuscript for publication is complete and you are ending the management review process.
decision.refer-desc-2: Final review by an RDS or DG is required for this management review.

delete-manuscript.message: Are you sure you want to delete the manuscript titled "{title}"?
delete-manuscript.title: Delete a Manuscript

delete-manuscript-pdf.manuscript-pdf-deleted: The manuscript file was successfully deleted
delete-manuscript-pdf.message: This will delete the following attached manuscript file: {file}
delete-manuscript-pdf.title: Please confirm

unsaved-changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
unsaved-changes.title: Unsaved Changes

delete-publication-pdf.message: This will delete the following attached publication file: {file}
delete-publication-pdf.title: Please confirm deletion of this file

error-invalid-signature.link-expired-text: The signed link you're using has likely expired.

expertise-select.hint: Start typing to search for an expertise

forgot-password-card.text: Don't fret, we've all been there before. Simply click the password reset button and we'll send you some instructions to get you back on track.
forgot-password-card.title: Reset Your Password

fundingSource.deleteConfirmation: Please confirm that you would like this funding source: {source}

invite-user-dialog.help: Invite a new user to the portal. The invite email will be sent to the user's email address and you will be able to know whether they have accepted the invitation under the "Sent Invitation" tab in the "Settings" menu.
invite-user-dialog.locale-hint: The invitation email will be sent using the chosen language.

journal-select.not-found-msg: Can't find the journal you're looking for? Please contact us so we can add it.
journal-select.search-hint: Start typing to search for a journal (title or ISSN)

login-card.email-verified-text: Email verified. You may now login.
login-card.new-password-required: You've been redirected because your account requires a new password.
login-card.login-with-microsoft: Sign-in with Microsoft - DFO Work Account
login-card.login-with-oauth: To access the portal, please sign in using your DFO credentials. By clicking the "Sign-in with Microsoft" button, you will be redirected to DFO's secure login page. This is the same system you use to access Microsoft 365 services. Once authenticated, you will be redirected to the portal.
login-card.login-with-oauth-2: If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
login-card.oauth-error: There was a problem with the authentication, please try again.

logout-card.text: Thank you for using the Open Science Portal.
logout-card.text-inactive: You've been logged out due to inactivity.

manage-author-profile-card.current-affiliation-hint: This will not affect the affiliation of any of your past publications.
manage-author-profile-card.orcid-not-verified: You can also verify or register with ORCID using "Manage ORCID"
manage-author-profile-card.orcid-verified: This is a verified ORCID. Use the Manage ORCID to change it.

manage-funding-source-card.subtitle: If applicable, please enter the funding source(s) that have helped generate this work.

manage-manuscript-author-card.delete-author-msg: Are you sure you want to delete this author?
manage-manuscript-author-card.instructions: Enter all authors, their affiliations and at least one corresponding author. Authors will appear in the list in the order they are entered.
manage-manuscript-author-card.title: Author(s) and Affiliation(s)

manage-pub-authors.no-authors: No authors identified, please add the publication authors here.

management-review-guidelines.subtitle: Please refer to the National Policy for Science Publications for more details.
management-review-guidelines.tip-one: Review the manuscript for compliance with the Intellectual Property Policy/Copyright Act, the Privacy Act, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs) and the DFO Code of Conduct.
management-review-guidelines.tip-two: Identify whether the manuscript is of potential public or media interest, solely for the purpose of briefing senior management and the Communications Branch. This information can be filled out in the Potential Public Interest section of the manuscript form. The inclusion of sensitive material (e.g. data, scientific conclusions) should not prevent publication of scientific papers.
management-review-guidelines.title: Management Review Guidelines

management-review-response.subtitle: Please review and address the concerns or comments raised by the management review. If changes to the manuscript are required, please upload the revised copy to the form prior to responding. Note that you can also make changes to the manuscript review form as required. If you do not agree with the concerns or comments, you can respond and ask for the management review to continue.
management-review-response.title: Management Review - Author Response

management-review-step-view.not-started-submit-your-form-to-begin: Not Started - Submit your form to begin
management-review-step-view.title: Management Review

manuscript-author-dialog.instructions: Search for the author you want to add using their name or professional email. If you cannot find the author you are looking for, or their affiliation or email has changed, you can create a new author record.
manuscript-author-dialog.title: Add an author to this manuscript

manuscript-progress-view.accepted-details: The manuscript was accepted for publication by the target journal and is entering the production process. Confirming this step will create a new publication record where you can upload the final manuscript and update the publication details.
manuscript-progress-view.completed-details: The manuscript complies with Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications and has been reviewed by DFO management. At this stage, you may now submit the manuscript to your target journal.
manuscript-progress-view.created-details: At this stage, only the applicant and authors can see and edit the manuscript record.
manuscript-progress-view.submit-management-details: The manuscript is initially submitted to a division manager or director (NCR) for management review.
manuscript-progress-view.submit-pub-details: The manuscript was submitted for peer-review. We track this stage to gather statistics on the time it takes to get manuscripts accepted and published.
manuscript-progress-view.title: Manuscript Progress
manuscript-progress-view.withdrawn-details: The manuscript was withdrawn by the applicant for the following reason:
manuscript-progress-view.submisison-to-dfo-title: Submit to the Science Publication Team
manuscript-progress-view.submission-to-dfo-details: Following your submission to the Science publication team, your manuscript will be marked as accepted in the portal. Your work will then undergo a technical edit before a final proof is sent to the corresponding author(s) for review. Once this is completed, the publication group will make arrangements to have the manuscript published in the appropriate series.
manuscript-progress-view.submitted-to-preprint: Submit your Manuscript to a Preprint Server
manuscript-progress-view.completed-preprint-details: The manuscript aligns with Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications and has been reviewed by DFO management. At this stage, you may now submit the manuscript to a preprint server.
manuscript-progress-view.submitted-to-preprint-details: You've submitted your manuscript to a preprint server. If the server assigns a DOI (Digital Object Identifier), please ensure that it is provided in your submission. If no DOI is available, a stable URL linking directly to the preprint should be included.

mrf.abstract-must-be-at-least-250-characters: Abstract must be at least 250 characters
mrf.additional-text: Examples of topics of potential public interest could include subjects related to current events, or of stakeholder interest. These can include interesting stories to showcase DFO research or studies that are more controversial. While this will never restrict publications in any way, this will serve to engage with, and inform our Communications colleagues. If it is deemed that a manuscript could be of public interest, the Communications team will be notified after the management review process, and again when the manuscript is marked as published by the applicant.
mrf.lead-region-text: Select the DFO region responsible for the management review of this manuscript. If more than one region is responsible, select the region that will lead the review.
mrf.manuscript-submitted-successfully: The manuscript record was successfully submitted.
mrf.not-authorized-text: You do not have permission to view this manuscript record
mrf.pls-already-generated-erase-it-to-genera: A PLS already exists - erase it to generate a new one
mrf.pls-help-ai-text: Need some help? Using your manuscript's abstract, we can generate a draft PLS. Make sure to review/edit the generated PLS! If you'd like to try again, simply delete the PLS and click "Generate PLS" again.
mrf.pls-text: A concise Plain Language Summary (PLS), in both official languages, is required for every scientific and technical publication. PLS should incorporate Indigenous place names and species, where appropriate.
mrf.source-pls-required-for-translation: Source language PLS is required for translation
mrf.target-pls-already-exists-erase-to-trans: Target language PLS already exists - erase it to translate
mrf.potential-media-interest-question: Is this manuscript of potential public interest?
mrf.potential-media-interest-text-field-text: Optionally, please provide any pertinent information concerning the potential public interest.
mrf.ready-to-marked-published: This manuscript has completed its management review but still needs to be marked as submitted and accepted to a thrid-party Journal by the applicant.
mrf.relevant-text: Describe how this manuscript is relevant to the program that funded it, how it supports the department's mandate, strategic plan and or/regional priorities.
mrf.replace-manuscript: Drop the file or click to upload a new version of the manuscript
mrf.sharing-confirm-delete-message: Please confirm the removal of {userName}'s access to this record.
mrf.sharing-subtitle: Share this manuscript with others users
mrf.submit-tooltip-disabled: Please complete all sections and save to submit
mrf.upload-hint: Only PDF files are accepted. Maximum file size is {max}MB.
mrf.upload-manuscript: Drop the file or click to upload manuscript
mrf.upload-text: Upload the most recent copy of your manuscript as a PDF. This file can be updated as required by the applicant, even after submitting the manuscript.
mrf.working-title-text: Enter to the manuscript's working title. You will be able to modify the title when you update this manuscript status to published.
mrf.functional-area-text: In order to improve reporting on research outputs, please select the relevant functional area for this manuscript.
mrf.no-ogl-explanation-text-field-text: DFO is committed to the "Open by Design and by Default" principle of Open Science, ensuring that all DFO publications are made available under the latest version of the "{url}" whenever possible. The Open Government Licence - Canada should not be applied if there are conflicting Licensing obligations.
mrf.apply_ogl: Should this report be licensed under the Open Government Licence - Canada?
mrf.ogl-provide-explanation: Since you answered "No", please provide an explanation of why an Open Government License cannot be applied to your report.
mrf.ready-to-submit: This manuscript has completed its management review and is now ready for submission to the Science publication team.
mrf.ready-to-submit-preprint: This manuscript has completed its management review and is now ready for submission to a preprint server.
mrf.intends_open_access: All publications must follow the open by design and by default approach. Unless an exception applies, your publications must be freely and publicly accessible upon release. Exceptions may include situations where information, data or code are sensitive for reasons of research security, proprietary interests, third-party restrictions, or are governed by legal, ethical, or confidentiality agreements.
mrf.open-access-rationale-text: Since you answered "No", please provide your rationale.
mrf.open-access-rationale-text-field-text: Do you intend to make your publication open access (e.g., by publishing in an open access journal, selecting open access options in a hybrid journal, or depositing in an open repository)?
mrf.pls-source-language-description: Please select the official language you will use for your plain language summary. You may provide both English and French summaries, but only the selected language is required to submit your manuscript.
mrf.pls-author-approval-description: Please confirm that you have reviewed and approve the Plain Language Summary in your selected source language before submitting your manuscript.
mrf.pls-approved-by-author-label: I confirm that I have reviewed and approve the Plain Language Summary
mrf.pls-approval-required-warning: Author approval is required before submission
mrf.pls-approval-disabled-no-content: Complete the Plain Language Summary before approval
mrf.pls-content-description: Write your Plain Language Summary in the language you selected above. You may also provide an optional translation in the other official language.

my-manuscript-records.no-manuscript: No manuscripts record form exist or are shared with you

my-publication-view.i-am-responsible-for-this-publication-re: I am responsible for this publication record

no-management-review.subtitle: Manuscripts you've recently been asked to review will appear here.
no-management-review.title: You have nothing to review

no-manuscript-exists-div.p1: Need to publish a primary or secondary publication? You've come to the right place. Create a manuscript record and start the process of publishing your manuscript following the national policy for science publications.
no-manuscript-exists-div.p2: The national policy ensures a consistent treatment of scientific publications across DFO regions, recognition of the scientific impact of the Department through the use of a standard affiliation, and effective tracking of our publications to better integrate science into departmental processes.

no-publication-exist-div.p1: Manuscripts that have been reviewed will appear here. Once published, you can update the publication details. You can also add any past publications here so that it is part of our database and available for all to see.

ocrid.verify-btn-text: Create or connect your ORCID iD

orcid.verify-header-text: Connect your ORCID iD (or register for an iD)
orcid.invalid-key: Invalid key - likely due to timeout - please try again.
orcid.invalid-user: User not found - internal error - please contact us.
orcid.failed: A problem occurred in authorizing your account with ORCID.org
orcid.connect-introduction: Linking your ORCID account with the Open Science Portal not only allows us to sync authoritative Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) information with your profile but also authenticates your ORCID identity with the Department. This verification enables DFO to link your ORCID iD with other persistent identifier (PID) metadata, such as DOIs for datasets and publications, ensuring consistency and traceability across scientific outputs. By connecting your ORCID account, you streamline the management of your professional profile, enhance discoverability, and strengthen the integrity of your contributions within the open science ecosystem.
orcid.connect-linked-text: The following ORCID is connected to your author profile:
orcid.employment-section-intro: This section allows you to officially update your ORCID employee profile with Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO). By allowing trusted organizations like DFO to manage these updates, you enhance the credibility of your professional profile, as the information will be recognized as authoritative and trustworthy. Ultimately, linking your DFO employment through the Open Science Portal not only establishes your employment at DFO but also boosts your visibility within the scientific community.
orcid.revoke-dialog-title: Confirm the disconnection your ORCID account
orcid.revoke-dialog-message: This will revoke the portal's access to your ORICD account. You can always reconnected it later. Information we've added to your profile up to this point will remain but you can choose to manually delete it.

organization-select.cant-find: Can't find the organization you're looking for?
organization-select.hint: Start typing to search for an organization

alt.logo: OSP logo - a prism dividing a single light stream into an array or colors.
alt.main-image: A person with a large lightbulb as a head. An old farmhouse tap is trickling water on a small tree sprout growing from the ground.

osp.description: The Open Science Portal is an intuitive web-based application to promote open science and track science publications within Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

policy.for-more-info: For more information please refer to the {policy}.

message.p1: Reviews the manuscript for compliance with the {copyrightsAct}, the {privacyAct}, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs) and the {dfoCodeOfConduct}.
message.p2: Identifies when a manuscript is of potential public interest for the sole purpose of informing RDS, DG and DFO Communications. Examples of topics of potential public interest could include subjects related to current events, or of stakeholder interest. These can include interesting stories to show case DFO research or studies that are more controversial. The inclusion of potentially sensitive material will not prevent the publication of a manuscript.

policy.national-policy-for-science-publications: Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications
policy.p2: Authors may submit their publication to the third-party journal for peer review after the manager has deemed the publication to be in alignment with the relevant legislation, policies and directives, or if no feedback was received from the management review within 10 working days. Division Managers, National Directors, Regional Directors of Science and National Directors General may perform the management review.
policy.p3: If a manager identifies issues related to the relevant legislation, policies, and directives, they must communicate with the author(s) to request revisions or refer the publication to the respective Regional Director of Science or National Director General, and the 10-working-day timeline is paused.

pub-author-dialog.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-aut: Are you sure you want to delete this author?

publication.lead-region-hint: Select the lead DFO region for this publication.

publication-page.attach-pub-details: Please upload the most recent version of your publication in PDF format. Files in this section are subject to the applicable embargo period and can only be accessed by authorized users, such as the authors and managers, until the embargo has expired.
publication-page.title: Publication
publication-page.attach-supplementary-files-details: Please upload all relevant supplementary files for your publications.
publication-page.mark-as-published-tooltip: Only a DFO Chief Editor can mark a DFO publication as published.

registered.text: Please check your email ({0}) for a confirmation link. To protect your account, you will not be able to login until you've confirmed your email address.

required-span.definition: Fields marked with an * are required.

reviewer-comments.description: Comments are required unless you complete the management review without sending it to another manager. Comments entered here should provide feedback to the subsequent management reviewer or author. Your comments will be visible to anyone with access to this manuscript record.
reviewer-comments.title: Manager Comments

shareable-dialog.abilities-text: By default, the user has the ability to view the resource. You can also allow the user to edit and delete this resource.
shareable-dialog.expiry-date-text: By default, the resource is shared until you manually remove the ability. If you prefer, you can also set an expiration date at which time the user will no longer be able to access this resource.
shareable-dialog.user-create-text: User with whom you want to share. The user will receive an email notification once you share this resource.

submit-decision-dialog.certify-text: I certify that, to the best of my knowledge, my review is based on the guidelines outlined in the DFO National Policy for Science publications. If applicable, I have read the comments provided by the previous manager and have considered them in my review.
submit-decision-dialog.next-reviewer-hint: Search for the appropriate person to complete the management review within the user list. If you cannot find their name, they are likely not yet registered, and you will be able to invite them to the portal.
submit-decision-dialog.no-comments-warning: Your management review has no comments. Therefore, you can only complete this review. Please add comments to support your review if you want to select from the other options.
submit-decision-dialog.subsequent-reviewer-is-required: Given your review, a subsequent manager is required to complete the review
submit-decision-dialog.no-comments-warning-cant-complete: A review comment is required to proceed.
submit-decision-dialog.planning-binder-tex: Please indicate whether this publication should be added to the scientific publications section of the planning binder that is sent to the ADM.

step1.confirmation-text: I certify that, to the best of my knowledge, this manuscript is in compliance with the Intellectual Property Policy/Copyright Act, the Privacy Act, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs), and the Values and Ethics Code for DFO.
step1.subtitle: Submission for Management Review
step1.title: Confirm Submission

step2.p1: To submit the manuscript for management review, search for the appropriate division manager/director within the user list. If you cannot find their name, they are likely not yet registered, and you will be able to invite them to the portal.
step2.p2: Note; you will not be able to select someone that is an author on this manuscript or the owner of this manuscript record.
step2.subtitle: Division Manager/Director
step2.title: Select Management Reviewer

submitted-to-journal-dialog.text: Mark this manuscript as having been submitted to a journal. This step lets all users involved in the management review know that you submitted your manuscript for publication.
submitted-to-journal-dialog.title: Update the manuscript status as submitted

user-profile.email-hint: Your verified email address cannot be changed manually.

user-select.cant-find-the-user-youre-looking-for: Can't find the user you're looking for?
user-select.not-the-user-youre-looking-for: Not the user you're looking for?
user-select.start-typing-to-search-for-a-user: Start typing to search for a user

withdraw-manuscript-dialog.text: Withdraw this manuscript. This lets us know that this manuscript will not be published and closes this manuscript record.
withdraw-manuscript-dialog.title: Withdraw this manuscript

orcid-employment-edit.delete-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete this employment record from your ORCID profile?
orcid-employment-edit.update-confirmation-message: By updating your ORCID employment record from the portal, you confirm that the information provided is accurate and reflects your current and past DFO employments to the best of your knowledge.
orcid-employment-edit.department-name-hint: Please include your sector. e.g.: Ecosystem and Oceans Science
orcid-employment-edit.dialog-title: Edit your DFO employment ORCID record
orcid-employment-edit.dialog-description: Add your verified DFO employment record to your ORCID profile to confirm your affiliation and enhance your visibility in the scientific community. Please ensure that all information provided is accurate and up-to-date.

orcid-employment-add.dialog-title: Add a DFO employment to ORCID

author-employment.add-employment-tooltip: Link your ORCID to add Employment

manage-peer-review.title: Peer Review
manage-peer-review.description: Please enter the peer reviewers for this report. At least two subject matter experts must have conducted a peer review of the report. Note that a peer review for data reports and contactor reports is optional.
manage-peer-review.no-reviewers: No reviewers. Please add at least two if applicable for your report.
manage-peer-review.delete-peer-reviewer-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this peer reviewer?

manuscript-peer-reviewer-dialog.instructions: Search for the peer reviewer you want to add using their name or professional email. If you cannot find the author you are looking for, or their affiliation or email has changed, you can create a new author record.

manuscript-peer-review-dialog.title: Add a peer reviewer for this manuscript

supplementaryFileType.authorAgreementDescription: The agreement signed by authors outlining publication terms
supplementaryFileType.errataDescription: Any corrections or updates to previously published work.
supplementaryFileType.jointCopyrightAgreementDescription: The agreement regarding copyright ownership and distribution rights.
supplementaryFileType.authorsAcceptedManuscriptDescription: The final manuscript accepted for publication after peer review.
supplementaryFileType.otherDescription: Any additional files related to your publication (please specify).
supplementaryFileType.preprintDescription: The version of the manuscript uploaded to a preprint server before peer review.
supplementaryFileType.manuscriptRecordFormDescription: A signed DFO manuscript record form (MRF) completed outside of the portal.

authors-view.dfo-authors-caption: Authors that have a DFO affiliation

publication-supplementary.upload-hint: Only PDF or Word files are accepted. Maximum file size is {max}MB.

submit-to-pub-team-dialog.title: Submit to the Science Publication Team
submit-to-pub-team-dialog.text: Congratulations! The Science publication team will be in touch with you and/or the corresponding author(s) shortly after the submission.

azure-user-select.search-hint: Start typing an email to search for a DFO user

submitted-to-preprint-dialog.title: Mark as published to a preprint server
submitted-to-preprint-dialog.text: You've submitted your manuscript to a preprint server. If the server assigns a DOI (Digital Object Identifier), please ensure that it is provided in your submission. If no DOI is available, a stable URL linking directly to the preprint should be included.

clone-manuscript-record-dialog.title: Duplicate Manuscript Record

step1.text: Choose the type of manuscript record to create from this duplicate. For example, if your current record is for a preprint, you might want to create a new record to publish to a journal.

clone-manuscript-record-dialog.clone-text: Please confirm you'd like to duplicate the manuscript record titled "{title}". Note that not all aspects of the record will be duplicated. The record status will be set to draft and you will become the applicant for the duplicated record.

regional-manuscripts.all-manuscripts-you-can-view: All manuscript records you have regional permissions to view
regional-manuscripts.in-management-review-process: Manuscripts currently in the management review process
regional-manuscripts.manuscripts-with-public-interest: Manuscripts flagged for potential public interest

author-profile.title: Author Profile
author-profile.no-publications-subtitle: This author has no publications yet
author-profile.expertise-description: Areas of expertise help users understand and trust content, and make it easier to find information they need.

InviteUserDialog.search-description: Search the DFO user directory by email to invite the selected user.

PublicationSupplementaryFileManagementCa.upload-instruction: Upload a supplementary file for the publication
